description: Just a stone’s throw from the centre and also accessible from the ski slopes, this contemporary, Alpine-style restaurant boasts a spacious dining room and large picture windows. Traditional regional and mountain cuisine with a modern twist and a wine cellar focusing on mountain wines from producers working  sustainably.
